name: BDroppy
author: BDroppy Development Team

sections.description:
BDroppy is auto importing product in you shop and auto manage stack from bdroppy server.

requirements:

  1. Bdroppy account
  2. WooCommerce
sections.installation:
How to install

  1. create account on bdroppy.
  2. create your catalog on bdroppy products.
  3. install plugin.
  4. setup api.
  5. select catalog.
  6. enjoy it.
